description: While there are tools for testing, metrics and refactoring, there was no tool to help figure out which parts of a codebase were lacking inline docs the most. This talk covers how the personal need for more biased documentation analysis led to the discovery of a largely neglected problem in Open Source and the creation of a CLI tool and a complementary CI service now used by hundreds of coders.
